lessons.japanese: どんな犠牲を払っても、それをやりとげるつもりだ。
lessons.english: I will accomplish it at all costs.

lessons.japanese: 彼は若いけれども、その仕事をやりとげる力がある。
lessons.english: Though he is young, he is equal to the task.

lessons.japanese: どんな犠牲を払っても、それをやりとげるつもりだ。
lessons.english: I will accomplish it at all costs.

lessons.japanese: どんな犠牲を払っても、それをやりとげるつもりだ。
lessons.english: No matter what the cost, I will accomplish that.

lessons.english: I will accomplish that no matter what the cost.
